name: RenAiDesigner
short_description: This application is an open source acting as tools to create game specializing in either dating simulation or visual novel by designing the characters involved in the game which might includes stats for dating simulation and extensive story design with possible multiple routes for the visual novel type. Possible features would be the ability to produce the game itself via import to the software for producing the game or natively compiling the game and the deployment to the target computer architectures. Additional probable features would be the ability to create and edit images of characters and background or simply just import images of characters and backgrounds, and the ability to either record voices as voice acting or the usage of computer generated voice (as external library or application links, this application will not attempt to generate computer voice.)
summary: As the name implied, it is an application to design RenAi game genre.
